objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#212121'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#2C2C2C'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#1A1A1A'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#1A1A1A'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#333333'/><g opacity='0.15'><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/></g><circle cx='270' cy='270' r='200' fill='#1A1A1A' opacity='0.5'/><g transform='translate(750, 150)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='8' fill='#E50012'/><circle cx='30' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='60' cy='0' r='8' fill='#E50012'/><circle cx='90' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g opacity='0.4'><path d='M20,200 A180,180 0 0,1 200,20' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M880,200 A180,180 0 0,0 700,20' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M20,880 A180,180 0 0,0 200,1060' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M880,880 A180,180 0 0,1 700,1060' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='40' stroke='#E50012' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='30' stroke='#E50012' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='20' stroke='#E50012' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g transform='translate(150, 750)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='#E50012'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='#E50012'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='#E50012'/><circle cx='60' cy='0' r='5' fill='#E50012'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='5' fill='#E50012'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Classic retro design with modern functionality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for image quality
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip
• Built-in Wi-Fi for instant sharing

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro design with modern functionality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-performance interchangeable lens system
• Durable black metal construction with ergonomic grip
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for instant sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Film simulation modes for creative expression
• Tiltable LCD screen for flexible shooting angles

banner_details:
The banner is a visually striking promotional design split into four quadrants with varying dark grey tones, creating a modern, geometric layout. The top-left section prominently features the brand name in bold white text (`heading`), followed by a vibrant red subheading (`subheading`) and a sleek grey tagline (`tagline`). The background incorporates concentric circles and diagonal lines for subtle visual depth. The right half showcases a high-resolution product image (`product_image`), slightly overlapping quadrants to draw attention. Below, a feature list (`description`) is placed with white bullet points, followed by a bold price tag (`price`) and an eye-catching red call-to-action button (`cta_background` + `cta`). Decorative icons and lines complement the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #212121
- Charcoal: #1A1A1A
- Dark Grey: #2C2C2C
- Light Grey: #AAAAAA
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Red: #E50012
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly showcasing sleek matte black tones (#1A1A1A) across the body, highlighted with metallic accents in gunmetal gray (#3C3C3C) and silver (#C0C0C0) on the dials and branding. The lens elements add depth with glossy blacks (#101010) and subtle reflections of yellow-green (#A6C500), blue (#66A3FF), and purple (#A088B8) hues, creating a modern, high-tech aesthetic. The color palette blends monochromatic neutrals with subtle color pops, drawing the viewer’s attention to key features. For an advertisement banner, a palette based on black, gray, silver, and accent tones would complement and emphasize the polished and professional look.
